LanguageData.BasicRecharger.label: mech recharger
LanguageData.BasicRecharger.description: Lightweight mechanoids can recharge here. During recharge, this recharger produces toxic wastepacks and stores them internally. Haulers must remove the wastepacks from time to time.
LanguageData.StandardRecharger.label: large mech recharger
LanguageData.StandardRecharger.description: Medium, heavy, and ultraheavy mechanoids can recharge here. During recharge, this recharger produces toxic wastepacks and stores them internally. Haulers must remove the wastepacks from time to time.
